lifecycles.description: Service is only being used/tested by the people building it.
lifecycles.name: Pre-alpha

lifecycles.description: Service is supporting features used by others at the company, or a very small set of friendly customers.
lifecycles.name: Alpha

lifecycles.description: Service is supporting features used by a larger set of beta customers.
lifecycles.name: Beta

lifecycles.description: Service is supporting features available to be used by all customers, and should be fully stable.
lifecycles.name: Generally Available

lifecycles.description: Service is being retired. Might have reduced or no support.
lifecycles.name: End-of-life
